name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 88: The Gal Mahjong: Love Songs: Idol wa High Rate
overview: Simple 1500 Series vol. 88 - The Gal Mahjong - Love Songs - Idol wa High Rate is a mahjong game in which the player takes the role of a high school student that will try to win the heart of one of the 8 girls that the game features. To win the girls' hearts he will have to win them in mahjong games. Each mahjong match will also give him points that he can exchange for calling cards, cds or posters, there are 56 unlockable items in the full collection. Instead of the main story mode, the game also features other modes like the free mode or the love game mode. The game features Japanese voice acting for the girls characters.
